actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to the Bureau of Land Management (deferral No. D76-102) which was transmitted to the Congress under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Disapproves the proposed deferral of budget authority in the amount of $3,016,211 for the Bureau of Land Management, Department of the Interior (proposed deferral number D76-102).

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to the Bureau of Land Management (deferral No. D76-102) which was transmitted to the Congress under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
